Advanced Racial Equity: 

•Signed Executive Orders advancing equity and racial justice and a separate Executive Order to expand Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Accessibility across the federal government.

•Provided $32B specifically for Tribal communities and Native people
We have lost a tremendous leader and beloved Soror ❤️  grace and love to Soror Hickmon’s family and friends and to all my Sorors @dstinc1913 https://t.co/PuMSPuFibt

Formed a Government That Looks Like America:

•President Biden was the first president since Reagan to get all his initial picks for the statutory cabinet confirmed, and the first president ever to have a cabinet that is half female and majority non-white. 
(11/12)

Confirmed Historic Judges: 

•More of President Biden’s lower-court judicial nominees were confirmed in his first year than any president since Kennedy.

•The President appointed more Black women to the Court of Appeals than any President ever. 
(10/12)

Bolstered Domestic Manufacturing:

•Increased the competitiveness of the U.S. economy. 

•Directed federal dollars to U.S. manufacturers by creating the first-ever Made in America Office.
(9/12)

Addressed Gun Violence and Crime: 

•President Biden issued a comprehensive strategy to reduce gun crime, gun trafficking, and “ghost guns.”

•Banned federal law enforcement from using choke holds and “no-knock” entries.

•Provided funding to community programs.
(8/12)

Took Aggressive Action to Tackle the Climate Crisis:

•President Biden rejoined the Paris Agreement.

•He jumpstarted an electric future made in America, doubling sales of electric vehicles in a year.
(7/12)

Restored America’s Global Leadership

•President Biden restored our global alliances and ended America’s longest war.

•The United States donated and delivered nearly 400 million vaccinations to developing countries.
(6/12)

Expanded Affordable Health Care

•President Biden increased the number of Americans with health care coverage to the highest number ever, lowered the co-pays, and slashed premiums for millions.

•The President implemented a ban on surprise billing.
(5/12)

Passed Laws to Create Jobs & Rebuild Crumbling Infrastructure

•President Biden got the American Rescue Plan and the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law passed.

•The American Rescue Plan led to the lowest child poverty rate on record and the unemployment rate is down to 3.9%.
(4/12)

Got People Back to Work

•President Biden has added 6.4 million jobs – the most ever in one year – and managed the fastest growing economy in decades. Recent weekly unemployment claims are down near a level not seen since 1969.
(3/12)

Got Shots in Arms & Saved Lives

•The President set up a historic vaccination program that resulted in more than 200 million Americans fully vaccinated this year.

•Millions of teenagers and children are now vaccinated, and about 96% of schools are open.
(2/12)

FACT SHEET: President Biden and Vice President Harris Delivered Results for Working Families in First Year
 (1/12)

Child poverty is a choice in the richest nation in the world. With the expanded and improved #ChildTaxCredit, the #AmericanRescuePlan transformed the way our nation treats children in poverty.
 
We cannot let the December 15 monthly check be the last one.

The #ChildTaxCredit has helped more than 36 million families afford groceries, pay their bills, and make ends meet. The bills come monthly and so should the checks. Monthly Child Tax Credit payments are essential to our recovery. https://t.co/YWZYPLCCwL

As a member of the House Agriculture Committee and Chair of the Subcommittee on Biotechnology, Horticulture and Research, I am able to advocate for the equitable treatment of the U.S. Virgin Islands agriculture community. #VIFarmTour
@GigabiteDan Passcode: 345344
Some of the common issues we heard about include: Access to water, power, internet, accessible roads, capital, and other infrastructure issues. #VIFarmTour

Over the last few months, we have been visiting farms and meeting with farmers to discuss and understand their current challenges and difficulties, as well as learn about their techniques and strategies that are working well. #VIFarmTour

Tune in NOW!! #VIFarmTour
